# 6.0 Docs

## SDK and MSBuild

- [-p option for `dotnet run` is deprecated](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/deprecate-p-option-dotnet-run.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where the '-p' option is deprecated for 'dotnet run'.
- [C# code in templates not supported by earlier versions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/csharp-template-code.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where project templates use new C# features that aren't available in previous versions.
- [EditorConfig files implicitly included](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/editorconfig-additional-files.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where .editorconfig files can no longer be AdditionalFiles items.
- [Generate apphost for macOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/apphost-generated-for-macos.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where an executable is generated by default when building on macOS.
- [Generate error for duplicate files in publish output](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/duplicate-files-in-output.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where the .NET SDK generates an error when files from different source paths would be copied to the same location in the publish output.
- [GetTargetFrameworkProperties and GetNearestTargetFramework removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/gettargetframeworkproperties-and-getnearesttargetframework-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where the GetTargetFrameworkProperties target and the GetNearestTargetFramework task have been removed from the MSBuild ProjectReference protocol.
- [Install location for x64 emulated on ARM64](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/path-x64-emulated.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where the installation location for the x64 version of .NET when installed on Arm64 hardware has changed.
- [MSBuild no longer supports calling GetType()](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/calling-gettype-property-functions.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 6 SDK where it's no longer supported to call GetType() within MSBuild property functions.
- [.NET can't be installed to custom location](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/install-location.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where .NET can no longer be installed to a custom location using the MSI installer on Windows.
- [OutputType not automatically set to WinExe](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/outputtype-not-set-automatically.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where `OutputType` for WPF and Windows Forms projects is no longer automatically set to `WinExe`.
- [Publish ReadyToRun with --no-restore requires changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/publish-readytorun-requires-restore-change.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where publishing a project with ReadyToRun requires changes to the way the project is restored.
- [runtimeconfig.dev.json file not generated](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/runtimeconfigdev-file.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 6 SDK where the runtimeconfig.dev.json file is no longer generated by default.
- [RuntimeIdentifier warning if self-contained is unspecified](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/runtimeidentifier-self-contained.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where specifying a `RuntimeIdentifier` without specifying whether an app is self-contained results in a warning.
- [Version requirements for .NET 6 SDK](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/vs-msbuild-version.md): Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 6 SDK where version 17.0 or newer of Visual Studio and MSBuild is required.
- [.version file includes build version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/version-file-entries.md): Learn about a breaking change in the .NET SDK where the .version file now includes the specific build version.
- [Write reference assemblies to IntermediateOutputPath](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/sdk/6.0/write-reference-assemblies-to-obj.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where reference assemblies are written to the IntermediateOutputPath by default.
